00034 
00035 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256) || defined(AT32UC3A0512) || defined(AT91SAM3S4C)
00036 /******************************************************************************
00037                    Types section
00038 ******************************************************************************/
00039 typedef  uint32_t atomic_t;
00040 
00041 /******************************************************************************
00042                    Inline static functions section
00043 ******************************************************************************/
00044 /******************************************************************************
00045  Disables global interrupt. Enter atomic section.
00046 ******************************************************************************/
00047 void halStartAtomic(atomic_t volatile *pAtomic);
00048 
00049 /******************************************************************************
00050  Exit atomic section
00051 ******************************************************************************/
00052 void halEndAtomic(atomic_t volatile *pAtomic);
00054   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER  {volatile atomic_t __atomic; halStartAtomic(&__atomic);
00055 
00056   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE  halEndAtomic(&__atomic);}
00057 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) \
00058    || defined(ATXMEGA128A1) || defined(ATXMEGA256A3) || defined(ATXMEGA256D3) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1)
00059 
00060   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER {atomic_t __atomic = halStartAtomic();
00061 
00062   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE halEndAtomic(__atomic);}
00063 #elif defined(SIMULATOR)
00064 
00065   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER  do {} while (0);
00066 
00067   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE  do {} while (0);
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 #endif // _ATOMIC_H
